text: Goodou gi langahia Jacob mo dono madahaanau ala ne hula gi Egypt, mo di hai o digau Egypt ala nogo hagaduadua digaula, mo di hai o godou maadua mmaadua di nadau tangi anga gi Dimaadua di hagamaamaa, gei Mee dela ga hagau mai a Moses mo Aaron, bolo meemaa gi lahia goodou gi daha mo Egypt, ga haga noho goodou gi lala i lodo tenua deenei.12.8 Exodus 2.23
